Subject Guide

Judy Markowitz
Email Me

4109 McKeldin Library

301-314-1316
Subjects:Government & Politics, LGBT Studies, Public Policy, Women's Studies

Welcome!

Do you have to write a research paper and you have to use scholary journal articles? Do you need reliable statistics? Do you need to find public opinion polls? Do you need a book that is checked out? Do you need help with citing your references properly? If you answered yes to even one of these questions, then this is the guide for you! 

Though not exhaustive, this guide provides an introduction to the core GVPT-centric tools and resources available at University of Maryland to help you locate the information you need to complete your assignments.

If you do not want to look and feel like this,


http://libweb.lib.buffalo.edu/blog/bizbrary/


save yourself some time and stress! Use this guide and then be sure to email Judy (judym@umd.edu) with any questions you have concerning library research and services.
